page.description: Create a crlf() delimited list of auto-increment implementations for the current SQL syntax.
page.example: dim conn as SQL::Connection dim connString as C connString = "{A5API='Access', FileName='c:\program files\a5v7\mdbfiles\alphasports.mdb'}" conn.open(connString) ? conn.ListAutoIncrementImplementations() = "AutoIncrement"
